entry.title: Wednesday: Chance of flurries. High minus 8. POP 30%
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud with 30 percent chance of flurries. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 8. Wind chill near minus 14. UV index 3 or moderate. Forecast issued 11:00 AM EST Wednesday 22 February 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 15. POP 30%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 30 percent chance of flurries this evening. Snow beginning near midnight. Local amount 5 to 10 cm. Wind becoming northeast 20 km/h near midnight. Low minus 15. Wind chill minus 14 this evening and minus 22 overnight. Forecast issued 11:00 AM EST Wednesday 22 February 2023
